name: Pentis
description:
Nobody has scored 100 000 points.

iOS version of 3D bricks game.
Also famous as BlockOut.
Pit dimensions are 3x3x18. The pieces have complex shapes. Each game piece consists of 1 to 5 cubes.
The number of pieces is up to 36.
Speed level is from 1 to 10.
Best scores are saved to the Twitter and FaceBook.
